channel.title: A wittle bit of a problem well adding pvp to my server
channel.description: ok well i add pvp to my server and i log on to see if it works and i get on and there no wild and i cant attack anyone and where do i get the icon to put at the bottom like 111-126 you can attack u know like in a pvp world so how do i fix?
